parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT) can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, or fail to accelerate, leading to potential accidents or stranding the driver. This can be particularly dangerous when driving on high-speed roads or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or loses power
the transmission slips or hesitates
the vehicle fails to accelerate
the RPMs jump erratically
the service engine light comes on
the transmission cooler fails to work properly
the vehicle "sputters" or shakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Power Loss and Fail-Safe Mode Activation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unintended loss of power while driving can lead to accidents, especially when traveling at high speeds, as it can cause the vehicle to slow down rapidly without warning, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly loses power and speed without warning
even when the accelerator pedal is fully pressed
causing the vehicle to slow down rapidly
often without any warning lights or indicators on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of rear sensors can cause the vehicle to malfunction, leading to unintended consequences, such as idle tires or loss of power, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear sensors fail
causing the vehicle to malfunction
resulting in idle tires or loss of power
and potentially leading to accidents or near-miss incidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to stall or die, resulting in loss of control, increased risk of accidents, and potential fire hazards.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly dies
burning electrical wiring smell
smoke coming out from under the hood
inability to drive the car safely.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty horn operation can lead to reduced safety in emergency situations, as the driver may not be able to alert other road users or pedestrians, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The horn is inaudible or does not function properly in emergency situations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT) can cause sudden loss of power, making it difficult to accelerate, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded in unsafe situations.
symptoms: Sudden loss of power
inability to accelerate
jerking or hesitation while driving
vehicle creeping forward at idle speed
transmission slipping into limp-home mode without warning lights or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning airbag warning light can lead to a false sense of security, potentially causing accidents or injuries if the airbag system fails to deploy in the event of a crash.
symptoms: The airbag warning light flashes on and off while driving
the front passenger seat airbag warning indicator illuminates when the passenger seat is occupied and the seat belt is latched.
